mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.phone AS "phone", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.address AS "address", a.addr_longitude AS "addrLongitude", a.addr_latitude AS "addrLatitude", a.email AS "email", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.source AS "source", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_info( id, name, sex, phone, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, addr_longitude, addr_latitude, email, org_id, source, station_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{address}, #{addrLongitude}, #{addrLatitude}, #{email}, #{orgId}, #{source}, #{stationId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_info SET name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, addr_longitude = #{addrLongitude}, addr_latitude = #{addrLatitude}, email = #{email}, org_id = #{orgId}, source = #{source}, station_id = #{stationId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
